constituent: pupil, eye, juvenile, vase, stand up, computer
heisigStory: Begin with the double meaning of the key word pupil: "student" and the "the apple of one's eye." Now all you have to do is dwell on the phrase "juvenile of one's eye" (the meaning here) until it provides you with an image.
hint: kara grl listening to a seashell
koohiiStory1: In Japanese comics, the eye´s of juvenilles all have enormouse pupils.
koohiiStory2: WARNING: This kanji only means the pupil of the eye. It can be confusing to use a story that has pupil meaning student in it.
myStory: học sinh. đôi mắt non trẻ
words: 瞳(ひとみ): eye, pupil (of eye)
